charges.charge_description: 18:1708 THEFT OR RECEIPT OF STOLEN MAIL MATTER(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 12 months and 1 day custody of BOP; supervised release 3 years; restitution $392.27; MSA $100 - AMENDED JUDGMENT: 7 months BOP. Supervised Release revoked: BOP 8 months.

charges.charge_description: 18:1708 THEFT OR RECEIPT OF STOLEN MAIL MATTER(2)

Complaint charging defendant with unlawfully and knowingly have in her possession approximately 150 pieces of mail which had been stolen, taken, embezzled and abstracted from U.S. mail collection boxes located in the cities of Dallas, Euless and Fort Worth in violation of Title 18 U.S.C. Section 1708
